version_description:
Everyone’s favorite Man of Steal is back! Get your thieving hands on thirty new levels of sneaky stealth action and don a classy new outfit: the Stylish Suit.

Social snatchers can now use Facebook to compete with friends and unlock achievements. W

It’s cold outside! Time to go sneak your way inside tons of new levels in an all new wintry chapter in the Robbery Bob saga. Want to get your thieving mitts on some bonus coins? Visit the Rewards Board on the main menu to find out how!

Everyone’s favourite smooth criminal ascends a high-rise building for all-new levels of looting in a new chapter available now. Robbery Bob has also been updated with language support for Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese and Traditional
Join Bob on his latest lootin’ lark as he heads out to Summer Camp for a whole new chapter of sneaking in the sun.

Robbery Bob gets a makeover with an all-new, extra fancy menu layout. Plus, iCloud support is finally here! Sync your sneaky escapades, abilities, loot and coins across all your Apple devices without having to lift a finger.

Robbery Bob gets a makeover with an all-new, extra fancy menu layout. Plus, iCloud support is finally here! Sync your sneaky escapades, abilities, loot and coins across all your Apple devices without having to lift a finger.

Robbery Bob gets a makeover with an all-new, extra fancy menu layout. Plus, iCloud support is finally here! Sync your sneaky escapades, abilities, loot and coins across all your Apple devices without having to lift a finger.

- Get bragging rights from snagging stuff with ReplayKit! Record and share your best sticky-fingered feats with your friends on YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any other social media account. Requires a device with an Apple A7 chip or later runni
Happy summer, you sneaky lot! We’ve added Arabic language support, bringing the total number of languages available in Robbery Bob to 11! Plus plenty of bug fixes and tweaks.
Keep thieving those treasures, Bob fans! This version squashes lots of bugs and adds some small usability improvements.

version_name: 1.12.3 optimises the app for iOS 10 and has some small bug fixes.                                                                                                                                                                                Version 1.12.2

version_description: Hi Bob fans! Version 1.12.3 optimises the app for iOS 10 and has some small bug fixes.
Hi Bob fans! Version 1.12.4 optimizes the app for iOS 10 and has some small bug fixes.
Earn FREE coins for completing offers with the new offers section, now live in the in-game store! We’ve also made some bug fixes and improvements so that you can keep sneaking smoothly.

- Bad with money? Fret not! The dealer’s got you covered with the new piggy bank, now available in the in-game store. The more coins you snatch and levels you play, the more the little piggy grows!
- Plus various bug fixes and improvements to keep Bob
This version contains a new and shiny menu layout and more fixes to keep Bob sneaking smoothly!

- Robbery Bob: Man of Steal now takes up significantly less space on your device, so you can download it, update it and get back to sneaking faster than ever, even over mobile networks!
- Don’t let ads steal your attention. You can now remove them FORE
Thank you for playing Robbery Bob! We are constantly working on improving the game. Download the latest version to get access to new features, optimizations and bug fixes.
